definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Office workers in South Korea have been trying various ways to peek at the Olympic matches during working hours.
sentences.chinese: 为在上班时间偷看奥运比赛，韩国上班族花样百出。

sentences.english: At the other end of the spectrum are the "gold-collar" workers.
sentences.chinese: 衣领暗码光谱的另一端则是“金领”上班族。

sentences.english: But, alas, that's not how the work world works.
sentences.chinese: 但是，唉，在上班族的世界里它没有好作用。

sentences.english: Among the mothers are both office workers and housewives.
sentences.chinese: 这些妈妈既是上班族又是家庭主妇。

sentences.english: I also read an article in which Gwynnie is bashing working moms.
sentences.chinese: 我还读过一篇文章，其中葛氏在批评有上班族妈妈们。

sentences.english: Office workers, families and schoolchildren amble past.
sentences.chinese: 上班族，居家者，学生在这里漫步走过。

sentences.english: For the nine to fives, fruit vinegar is the best drink to fight off fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 对于上班族来说，果醋是能够消除疲劳的最佳饮品。

sentences.english: Yes, indeed, I was a telecommuter at last.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我终于真正成为一个“在家上班族”了。

sentences.english: In addition, 40% of office workers always choose simple tasks to do first.
sentences.chinese: 更有4成的上班族总是先挑简单的工作做。

sentences.english: Annoyed commuters could only watch as the departure time ticked by.
sentences.chinese: 随着发车时间一点点过去，恼怒的上班族只能干瞪眼。

sentences.english: The commuter is the queerest bird of all.
sentences.chinese: 上班族是天下最怪异的人。

sentences.english: A group of working adults got together to visit their University lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 一群上班族一同去拜访他们的大学老师。

sentences.english: Office workers think that coworkers who like to complain and do not self-reflect are the most annoying.
sentences.chinese: 而上班族最讨厌的同事也是爱抱怨又不反省的同事。

sentences.english: Shopping for summer clothes to wear to work?
sentences.chinese: 上班族们开始夏装大采购了吗？

sentences.english: In Pudong, the skyscraper district of Shanghai, office workers are calm and phlegmatic.
sentences.chinese: 在上海高楼林立的浦东区，上班族们镇定自如。

sentences.english: Semi-finished dishes, time-saving commodities and glad tidings FOR those who go to work regularly.
sentences.chinese: 半成品菜肴，真正省时商品，上班族的福音。

definition: to go to work/to be on duty/to start work/to go to the office
time of going to work/the morning rush hour
to finish work/to get off work
